## mn-schools.csv {#mn-schools}

```{r}
#| echo: false
source("scripts/_common.R")
```

The data in [mnSchools.csv](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zief0002/modeling/main/data/mn-schools.csv) were collected from [http://www.collegeresults.org](http://www.collegeresults.org) and contain 2011 institutional data for $n=33$ Minnesota colleges and universities. The attributes include:

- `name`: College/university name
- `grad`: Six-year graduation rate (as a percentage)
- `sector`: Educational sector (Public; Private)
- `sat`: Estimated median composite SAT score (in hundreds)
- `tuition`: Amount of tuition and required fees covering a full academic year for a typical student (in thousands of U.S. dollars)


<br />
